response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, but I understand its worth may vary based on your specific requirements. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $120. I believe this strikes a fair balance between compensating for my investment and providing you with a reasonable cost. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 120}
